deploySecuredLineWithModules((address,ui.details: We don't transfer the ownership of Escrow and Spigot internally          because they aren't owned by the factory, the responsibility falls          on the [owner of the line]The `cratio` in the CoreParams are not used, due to the fact          they're passed in when the Escrow is created separately.

rolloverSecuredLine(address,address,uint.details: borrower must call rollover() on `oldLine` with newly created line address

params.oldLine: - line to copy config from for new line.
params.ttl: - set total term length of line

returns.line: - address of newly deployed line with oldLine config

rolloverSecuredLine(address,address,uint.notice: sets up new line based of config of old line. Old line does not need to have REPAID status for this call to succeed.
